translation.en: [man, in English] Walk on, old man.
Are you deaf?
I said, are you deaf?
[man] Where is he?
-Where is he? -[moans]
-Huh? -[crash]
-Mr. Young? -Yeah.
-How many more? -Two outside.
[in Cantonese] Asshole!
[in English] Who are you?
I'm a chef.
Hey, Lu. Heads up.
Listen, if you don't want it, I will give it to John Kang, or the kid from Shanghai.
translation.de: Ich gebe ihn sonst John Kang oder dem Typ aus Shanghai.

translation.en: Ten o'clock, tomorrow morning.
Yes, the white one. Oracle lights, Asanti wheels.
Perfect. We'll see you at nine.
What are you still doing here?
I'm helping Tommy.
-Just for tonight. -No, I mean what's happening
with the... the food truck idea? You know, traveling around the music festivals.
translation.de: du wolltest mit einem Foodtruck Musikfestivals bereisen.

translation.en: -I love that. -I'm working on it.
-It's happening. Don't worry. -If you need help on the money part,
translation.de: -Das läuft, keine Sorge. -Wenn du Geld brauchst,

translation.en: I could, uh... help you.
Dude. Do I look like I need help with the money part?
translation.de: Sehe ich so aus, als würde ich Geld brauchen?

translation.en: [laughs] You rea-- You really want me to answer that?
-I know. -You're the sorriest looking jungle rat I've ever seen in my life.
Are you sure you're Chinese? Half.
Which half?
The one you can't see.
Take this to table three.
Uh... Eh. Table three. Thank you.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. Listen, man, I'm serious.
If you need help with the money,
I got plenty of money.
You, my friend, you have a dream.
I'm good, thanks.
Okay. But when you're ready, let me know.
translation.de: Aber wenn du so weit bist, sag Bescheid.

translation.en: I'll get you a deal on a truck, we'll trick it out at the shop.
translation.de: Ich besorge dir einen Truck, den motzen wir auf.

translation.en: It'll be the envy of food truck owners everywhere.
As soon as we... explain to them what the word "envy" means.
translation.de: Wenn wir ihnen das Wort "Neid" erklärt haben.

translation.en: -You're not funny. -[laughs] The girl I was with last night, she said I was.
translation.de: -Du bist nicht lustig. -Die Mieze letzte Nacht fand mich lustig.

translation.en: -You know where to find me, right? -Hey, stay out of jail.
translation.de: -Du weißt, wo ich bin. -Lass dich nicht einbuchten.

translation.en: -You too! -[door opens]
[man] Where's Kai?
I told you no peanuts. In anything.
translation.de: Ich hab gesagt, keine Erdnüsse. Egal in was.

translation.en: No, you didn't.
I told you, right? [in Cantonese] What?
-No peanuts! -There are no peanuts!
-Apologize. -[whimpers]
What did I do?
No! I won't do it again. No!
[in Cantonese] Apologize to her, not me! I didn't use any peanuts!
translation.de: -Entschuldige dich bei ihr! -Da waren keine Erdnüsse!

translation.en: [in English] Jimmy, get out of here!
-Take off. -Fuck!
-[yells] -Jimmy, leave!
Wait a minute. Whoa, seriously.
[panting] Hey, put that away.
It-- It was a misunderstanding. Come on.
translation.de: Es war ein Missverständnis. Komm schon.

translation.en: Okay, come on. Hey, guy. Come on. Come on.
translation.de: Ok, komm schon. Hey, Typ, komm.

translation.en: Nobody got hurt. It's all good, it's party time--
translation.de: Niemand wurde verletzt. Ist doch alles gut.

translation.en: -[in Cantonese] Let's go! -Bottoms up!
[in English] What's the matter with you? Are you stupid?
Those guys are Triad, they'll fuck you up. They'll blow your brains out, asshole.
translation.de: Das sind die Triaden, die pusten dir das Hirn weg.

translation.en: Get out of here, go.
I'll take care of it. Go.
You're still awake?
Hey, what's up, bro?
Early morning?
Late night.
Thank you.
What is it?
[in Cantonese] Yuet Guk balls.
-[in English] What is it for? -Stagnation.
Why do I need this?
You said you're gonna buy your own food truck, hit the road.
translation.de: Du willst doch mit einem Foodtruck herumfahren.

translation.en: You're still here.
Twice a day, till you're gone. Good night.
translation.de: Zweimal am Tag, bis du weg bist. Nacht.

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Young.
Good morning, Mrs. Bao.
Mr. Lin!
Good morning, Jenny! Say hi to Auntie Wah for me!
translation.de: Morgen, Jenny! Grüß Tante Wah von mir!

translation.en: I will.
-[in English] Are you okay? -Ow! Shit, man. Let me sleep.
translation.de: -Bist du ok? -Au! Scheiße. Lass mich schlafen.

translation.en: -Tommy, what happen-- -Cut it out, Jenny! Stop!
-Oh, fuck! -What happened?
[sighs] We had a little party. Yeah, but what-- what--
Who did this to you?
Was it someone at the party? Were people fighting in here?
translation.de: Jemand auf der Party? Gab es hier Zoff?

translation.en: No, Kai just...
Kai was here?
He was doing me a favor, and got into it with that guy Chen...
translation.de: Er tat was für mich und geriet mit diesem Chen aneinander...

translation.en: He-- He's fine. I-- I got him out of here before anything happened.
You have to fix this. I don't want Kai to-- Kai can take care of himself!
translation.de: -Ich will nicht, dass Kai... -Kai kann auf sich aufpassen!

translation.en: And those guys, they won't mess with a friend of mine. They're my brothers.
translation.de: Und die Typen werden sich nicht mit meinem Kumpel anlegen.

translation.en: No, they're fucking criminals! And I don't want them in here, okay?
translation.de: Das sind Kriminelle! Ich will die hier nicht haben.

translation.en: This is my restaurant, too.
I don't need my-- my sister's permission to have a... a little... [sighs]
translation.de: Ich brauche nicht die Erlaubnis meiner Schwester, um eine Runde...

translation.en: You know?
They're my family.
I'm your family.
Don't worry about it. I'll clean it up.
Have you ever heard of Little Pete?
He was the first Chinese millionaire in the United States.
translation.de: Er war der erste chinesische Millionär in den USA.

translation.en: The, uh... The first Chinaman to refuse to carry papers required by the Geary Act.
translation.de: Der Erste, der sich der Ausweispflicht für Chinesen nicht beugte.

translation.en: The first dragon head in Chinatown.
People said crossing Little Pete was like...
translation.de: Little Pete zu verärgern, war wie...

translation.en: erasing your name from God's journal.
Do you believe in God?
Everybody wanted a piece of Little Pete.
translation.de: Jeder wollte ein Stück von Little Pete.

translation.en: Hatchet men were...
were imported from China to assassinate him.
translation.de: ...aus China geholt, um ihn zu erledigen.

translation.en: The Irish tried to burn him out of the docks.
The police came after him with clubs and silly ordinances,
translation.de: Die Bullen kamen mit Knüppeln und Verordnungen,

translation.en: designed to kill his soul and drive him out of Chinatown. Everything failed.
translation.de: die seine Seele töten und ihn vertreiben sollten. Vergeblich.

translation.en: You know why?
Because, like me...
Little Pete was willing to do whatever's necessary
to protect his business, his people, his territory.
translation.de: um sein Geschäft, seine Leute, sein Territorium zu schützen.

translation.en: I want you to tell Alec McCullough...
where he'll end up, should he continue his incursions into Chinatown.
translation.de: wo er landet, wenn er weiterhin in Chinatown Ärger macht.

translation.en: Okay?
Yeah? Okay.
Oh, wait a minute.
On second thought, I think he'll get the message.
translation.de: Ich denke, die Botschaft kommt auch so an.

translation.en: [man] Two bodies were found in a shipping container this morning.
translation.de: Zwei Leichen wurden in einem Container gefunden,

translation.en: Shot, execution-style.
Triad's fingerprints are all over this.
The victims were known associates of Alec McCullough.
translation.de: Die Opfer arbeiteten für Alec McCullough.

translation.en: Operates mostly in Europe. Six months ago, he relocated to San Francisco.
translation.de: Der ist überwiegend in Europa tätig, wohnt aber neuerdings in San Francisco.

translation.en: Now, McCullough's already tried to squeeze into Chinatown,
translation.de: Er wollte gleich in Chinatown eindringen,

translation.en: but the dragon head, Uncle Six, ain't havin' it.
translation.de: aber nicht mit Drachenkopf Uncle Six.

translation.en: My Spidey sense says we're gonna have a gang war if we don't calm things down.
translation.de: Wenn wir die Lage nicht beruhigen, gibt es einen Bandenkrieg.

translation.en: Let 'em take each other out. Less work for us.
There's not gonna be a gang war in Chinatown, Bendix.
translation.de: Es wird keinen Bandenkrieg in Chinatown geben.

translation.en: Don't you wanna know why?
'Cause we're gonna be all over this shit before McCullough gets any more situated.
translation.de: Weil wir eingreifen, bevor McCullough sich weiter einlebt.

translation.en: That's why.
McCullough's number two...
He's recruited Uncle Six's own guy, Lu Xin Lee,
translation.de: Er rekrutierte einen Mann von Uncle Six, Lu Xin Lee,

translation.en: to put together a crew.
Six catches wind of that,
it ain't gonna sit well.
Inspector Gavin.
She's from Bayview. She's been workin' Vice over there.
translation.de: Sie ist aus Bayview, arbeitete dort undercover.

translation.en: She's gonna embed in Lee's crew.
translation.de: Sie nistet sich in Lees Crew ein.

translation.en: Chinese ain't gonna hire a girl to steal cars, boss.
translation.de: Chinesen engagieren keine Frau als Autodieb.

translation.en: Gavin's here because she speaks fluent Russian, just like Babinov.
translation.de: Gavin spricht fließend russisch, wie Babinov.

translation.en: She's got experience liberating cars from their rightful owners, just like Babinov.
translation.de: Sie hat schon viele Autos abgezockt, wie Babinov.

translation.en: She's a fresh face. Sorry, Cap.
You fuck up in Vice, you go home with a canker sore.
translation.de: Wer undercover versagt, geht lädiert heim.

translation.en: You fuck up in Chinatown, you don't go home.
translation.de: Wer in Chinatown versagt, geht gar nicht heim.

translation.en: Or I don't. You don't have to worry about me, Bendix.
translation.de: -Zumindest ich nicht. -Keine Sorge um mich, Bendix.

translation.en: The only thing that you got on me... is a smaller dick.
translation.de: Das Einzige, was du mir voraus hast, ist ein kleinerer Schwanz.

translation.en: All right, all right. Let's go.
UC assignments are there in your files. You got eyes and ears on the Triad.
translation.de: Ihr habt eure Aufgaben. Lasst die Triaden nicht aus den Augen.

translation.en: You hear anything ugly, I wanna know about it.
translation.de: Wenn ihr was hört, will ich es wissen.

translation.en: One more thing.
This McCullough... He's a jaundiced motherfucker.
translation.de: Dieser McCullough ist eine ziemliche Mistsau.

translation.en: Watch yourselves.
-Kung Pao Sting and Happy Family. -Thanks.
-Hannah. -What's up, Kai?
-Dragon Shrimp? -Is there any other kind?
Hey, boss. How we doing on shrimp?
Uh, I'll go get some more.
-Start pushing the squid. -Okay.
Uh, Hannah...
-how'd you like to try the squid? -No.
All right, no squid.
Most people knock, bro.
I'm aware.
What we got here?
Mm, it's good.
Moo goo wrap, and lemon chicken salad.
translation.de: Moo Goo Wrap und Lemon Chicken Salad.

translation.en: Seriously, how much money can you make in a food truck? Not as much as my boss.
translation.de: Was verdient man mit einem Foodtruck? Weniger als mein Boss.

translation.en: How much you make selling cars?
Not enough, which is why I also steal them.
translation.de: Zu wenig, darum klaue ich auch welche.

translation.en: You know what I don't get? You live like a king,
translation.de: Eins kapiere ich nicht: Du lebst wie ein König,

translation.en: but I never see you working.
I live like a dog, bro, and all I do is work.
translation.de: Ich lebe wie ein Hund und tu nichts als arbeiten.

translation.en: Yeah, but that's your problem right there, brother.
You think if you don't work like a dog, you're never gonna get anywhere.
translation.de: Du denkst, ohne zu schuften wirst du nichts erreichen.

translation.en: You gotta-- You gotta un-Confucius that brain of yours, man.
translation.de: Du denkst, ohne zu schuften wirst du nichts erreichen. Du musst weniger grübeln, Mann.

translation.en: But, listen, uh... put a pin in that, 'cause I heard about what happened last night with Chen and Lau.
translation.de: Ich habe gehört, was gestern Abend mit Chen und Lau passiert ist.

translation.en: After you left...
those guys took it out on Tommy,
who tried to tell them you're protected, but...
translation.de: der ihnen erklärte, du seist geschützt, aber...

translation.en: who listens to Tommy, right?
Yeah.
You might wanna call Uncle Six.
No. Hannah!
-Thanks, Kai. See you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
They're not gonna let this go.
The Triad will come for you.
So be ready.
-How about you just talk to them for me? -Doesn't work that way, brother.
translation.de: -Kannst du nicht mit ihnen reden? -So läuft das nicht.

translation.en: Come on. Take it.
For what? Who am I gonna shoot?
translation.de: Wofür? Um auf wen zu schießen?

translation.en: How about you just don't get shot?
Shit!
Shit!
Don't move.
Stay put.
[in Cantonese] Hang up. [in Indonesian] Hang up!
[in English] I've been looking for you, Kai.
This is the Monk Piece.
It holds the power of a thousand monks.
translation.de: Er hat die Kraft von 1000 Mönchen.

translation.en: Those powers are yours now.
What was that?
That is what's going to kill you, if you don't listen to me.
translation.de: Das wird dich töten, wenn du mir nicht zuhörst.

translation.en: Those warlords were the first to be corrupted by the elemental powers of the Wu.
translation.de: Diese Krieger wurden als Erste von den Wu-Elementarkräften verdorben:

translation.en: Earth, Water, Metal, Wood,
and Fire.
They waged war against ancient China,
translation.de: Sie führten Krieg gegen das Alte China

translation.en: leaving the land awash in blood,
translation.de: und vergossen im ganzen Land Blut,

translation.en: until a thousand holy monks sacrificed themselves
translation.de: bis 1000 Mönche sich opferten und einem Auserwählten die Kraft gaben,

translation.en: to empower a Chosen One to stop them.
translation.de: bis 1000 Mönche sich opferten und einem Auserwählten die Kraft gaben, sie zu stoppen.

translation.en: What's this got to do with me? Where are we?
translation.de: Was hat das mit mir zu tun? Wo sind wir?

translation.en: This place is the Path. It exists between Heaven and Earth.
translation.de: Das hier ist der Pfad zwischen Himmel und Erde.

translation.en: You're here because the Wu Powers are still with us.
translation.de: Du bist hier, weil wir immer noch Wu-Kräfte haben.

translation.en: Five new warlords are converging on San Francisco as we speak.
translation.de: Fünf neue Warlords nähern sich in diesem Moment San Francisco.

translation.en: You will stop them.
-How? -By killing them.
I'm not a killer. I'm a chef.
translation.de: Ich bin kein Killer, ich bin Koch.

translation.en: No, Kai. You are the Wu Assassin.
translation.de: Nein, Kai. Du bist der Wu-Assassin.

translation.en: You are the Chosen One.
The Monk Piece is in you. It gives you the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.de: Du hast den Mönchsschild in dir, der dir die Kraft von 1000 Mönchen gibt.

translation.en: Their strength flows through you. Their faces protect you.
translation.de: Ihre Stärke durchströmt dich, ihre Gesichter schützen dich.

translation.en: -I'm going home. -Yes.
And when you do... you'll find the Wu and kill them...
translation.de: Aber du wirst das Wu finden und sie töten,

translation.en: before they destroy your world like they did mine.
translation.de: ehe sie deine Welt zerstören wie meine.

translation.en: [echoing] Where am I? You're in the hospital, sir. Just had an accident.
translation.de: -Wo bin ich? -Im Krankenhaus, nach einem Unfall.

translation.en: -Something-- Something happened to me-- -Yes.
You were found on the street. We're gonna take care of you.
translation.de: Sie lagen auf der Straße, wir kümmern uns um Sie.

translation.en: [woman] You've been imbued with the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.de: Du hast die Kraft von 1000 Mönchen in dir.

translation.en: You are the Wu Assassin.
Their faces will protect you so you can do what they could not.
translation.de: Ihre Gesichter schützen dich, damit du tust, was sie nicht konnten.

translation.en: -Jenny! Hey. -Hey! What happened?
-I had an accident. -Yeah, I know. The hospital called me.
translation.de: -Ich hatte einen Unfall. -Ja, das Krankenhaus rief an.

translation.en: I'm in your phone. Emergency contact? Oh, sorry.
translation.de: -Du hast mich als Notfallkontakt im Handy. -Oh, sorry.

translation.en: Are you okay?
Tommy asked me to cook.
-I'm sorry if shit happened. -Shit did happen.
You know shit happened.
What's-- What's the matter with you?
You don't just... take on the Triad like that. What were you thinking?
translation.de: Man geht nicht auf die Triaden los. Was dachtest du dir?

translation.en: I was thinking they broke Jimmy's nose.
And, you know, Tommy never told us not to put peanuts in the--
translation.de: Und Tommy sagte nichts von Erdnüssen...

translation.en: This isn't about peanuts.
It's so like you. Just can't get out of your own way.
translation.de: Das ist typisch, du stehst dir selbst im Weg.

translation.en: I know. Thanks for the lecture.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Danke für den Vortrag.

translation.en: Could you come work for me?
You don't belong in a food truck, and I could really use you in my kitchen.
translation.de: Du gehörst nicht in einen Foodtruck, ich kann dich gut gebrauchen.

translation.en: Sorry...
but I've got my own problems right now.
Thanks for coming to get me.
Yeah.
She looked mad.
She's always mad.
"There's no friendship without love, and no love without friendship." Hm?
translation.de: "Keine Freundschaft ohne Liebe, und keine Liebe ohne Freundschaft."

translation.en: I don't have time for your Confucius bullshit right now, Mr. Young.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Zeit für Ihren Konfuzius-Quark, Mr. Young.

translation.en: Confucius?
-Tony Robbins. -Oh, my God.
He's my human potential thought leader.
I'm doing this cleanse, right?
Clear my mind, you know, and then Tony said--
translation.de: um den Kopf freizubekommen, und Tony...

translation.en: Mr. Young...
I don't care what Tony says.
translation.de: mir ist egal, was Tony sagt.

translation.en: [chuckles] Have a good day.
-Here you go, Lu Xin. -Thank you, DeeDee.
-So, what are you doing later tonight? -Dinner with the hubby.
translation.de: -Was machst du heute? -Essen mit meinem Mann.

translation.en: -Yeah, you tell him I'll bring the wine. -[laughs]
translation.de: Sag ihm, ich bring den Wein.

translation.en: A little birdie told me that you're looking to hire some people.
translation.de: Ein Vögelchen zwitscherte mir, du suchst Leute.

translation.en: Short, Latino dude? Works on auto parts?
Ring a bell?
The same irritating little fuckbird...
also told me that you got a problem with women.
translation.de: Derselbe nervige Kackvogel meinte außerdem, du hast ein Problem mit Frauen.

translation.en: That true?
DeeDee.
Do I have a problem with women? No.
I think that, um...
I think you're at the wrong table.
I'm at the right table.
[DeeDee] Can I get you anything to eat, hon?
No, thanks.
I was just leaving.
Your mother was Indonesian and a Muslim. Yet, you come here often.
translation.de: Deine Mutter war indonesische Muslimin und doch bist du oft hier.

translation.en: The first time was with you.
translation.de: Das erste Mal war mit dir.

translation.en: So you haven't discarded everything I told you.
translation.de: Du weißt also noch, was ich dir sagte.

translation.en: [in Cantonese] He's here.
Tell Marshall to watch the car.
-He's going to want to eat after this. -Where?
Chow's. Tell the guys.
[in English] This used to be the Song Garden. Well, they couldn't pay their rents.
translation.de: -Das war mal Song Garden. -Sie konnten die Miete nicht zahlen.

translation.en: Well...
What do you think?
About what?
What it could be.
What could it be?
Yours.
Here.
Bar could be here.
Kitchen behind the glass.
I'm gonna make the terms very favorable. Ten years...
translation.de: Ich gebe dir gute Konditionen. In zehn Jahren...

translation.en: it'll be yours.
What do you think?
No, thanks. I'm good.
Don't tell me you still feel you don't belong here.
translation.de: Sag nicht, du gehörst nicht hierher.

translation.en: You're my son.
Everyone accepts that except you.
-I don't need your help. -Everybody needs my help.
Not me.
No, not you.
Never you.
You see, that's what I don't understand.
I plucked you out of the bowels of a ship. Saved you from a life of bondage.
translation.de: Ich zog dich aus dem Rachen eines Schiffs, ersparte dir ein schweres Leben,

translation.en: Raised you in my home.
Sent you to school. Introduced to you...
-families whose children are your best-- -I've heard this story.
You talk as if your father could've done any of it for you?
translation.de: Hätte dein Vater all das getan?

translation.en: Look! My father loved me and he got me here!
translation.de: Mein Vater liebte mich, dank ihm bin ich hier!

translation.en: I got you here.
Why are you holding on?
Let it go.
-♪ Galaxies, galaxies ♪ -Good to see you.
-Your brother's looking for you. -Thank you.
[sighs] Oh, shit, Tommy.
They're lined up around the corner. It's insane.
translation.de: Sie stehen Schlange, es ist irre.

translation.en: [Tommy] I owe you an apology.
It's in the past. -Already forgot about it. -Don't...
-What? -Don't...
-Don't do that. -Don't do what?
Can you just accept my apology without making me feel like shit?
translation.de: Wenn du nicht akzeptierst, fühle ich mich scheiße.

translation.en: Okay.
I accept your apology.
-That it? -I want you to know,
if Kai hadn't fucked everything up last night, you never even would've known we were here.
translation.de: Hätte Kai es nicht verbockt, hättest du nichts von uns mitbekommen.

translation.en: That's the way I do things, okay? I'm not a total fuckup.
translation.de: So gehe ich nun mal vor, ok? Ich bin kein Totalversager.

translation.en: I don't-- I don't think you're a total fuckup.
translation.de: Ich halte dich nicht für einen Totalversager.

translation.en: I need money.
-[laughs] -It's for rent.
-For rent? -Uh...
I'm clean.
Look.
Seriously, I don't know what I spend my money on. I don't. It just, you know, just... poof.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wofür ich Geld ausgebe. Es ist plötzlich einfach weg.

translation.en: I get paid on Friday, rent's due tomorrow. I just need you to float me for a couple days.
translation.de: Freitag werde ich bezahlt, die Miete ist morgen fällig.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm-- Can you just please forget about the Triad?
translation.de: Tommy, was machst du bloß? Vergiss doch die Triaden.

translation.en: You've been talking to Mom and Dad? No.
translation.de: -Du hast mit Mom und Dad gesprochen. -Nein.

translation.en: No!
Mom and Dad think I'm a fuck-up. Who cares what Mom and Dad think?
translation.de: -Die denken, ich tauge nichts. -Wen kümmert, was die denken?

translation.en: You can just work here. With me.
-In your restaurant. -Yes, in my restaurant.
Our restaurant.
You took a loan from Uncle Six.
-You didn't think I knew, did you? -You're a fucking sneak--
What would Mom and Dad say if they knew
translation.de: Mom und Dad werden sich freuen,

translation.en: their beloved golden child borrowed money from the Triad,
translation.de: dass ihre geliebte Tochter mit Triaden-Kohle

translation.en: -to renovate her beloved restaurant? -Tommy--
No, bullshit! Come on! It's just $1,200. That is nothing to you.
translation.de: Nein, Blödsinn! 1200 $ sind doch ein Klacks für dich.

translation.en: It's just 1,200 bucks for two days.
translation.de: Es sind nur 1200 $ für zwei Tage.

translation.en: That's it.
-For rent. -For rent, yes. For rent. Shit!
Friday.
You better not be fucking with me.
I'm not fucking with you.
Thank you.
By the way, your two new servers are illegal. Be careful.
translation.de: Deine neuen Server sind illegal, also pass auf.

translation.en: And, uh...
Angela, the new girl?
She's too easy on the campers. She's gotta turn those tables.
translation.de: Sie lässt die Trödler zu lange sitzen.

translation.en: Can you stay tonight?
I could really use your help.
Friday.
[man, in English] Don't lie to me! Which key is it?
translation.de: Lüg mich nicht an! Welcher Schlüssel?

translation.en: Where's the key?
Tell me where he is!
What's your business, old man?
What's yours?
Leave!
Walk on, old man.
Are you deaf?
I said, "Are you deaf?"
-Where is he? -[moans]
-Huh? -[crash]
You need to kill them.
I told you. I'm not a killer.
translation.de: Ich sagte, ich bin kein Killer.

translation.en: The Wu Assassin is a hero and a killer, Kai.
translation.de: Der Wu-Assassin ist ein Held und ein Killer.

translation.en: And you are the Wu Assassin.
-No. Find another way. -There is no other way.
translation.de: Nein. -Finde einen anderen Weg. -Es gibt keinen.

translation.en: The Monk Piece is in you. Evil is attracted to it.
translation.de: Der Mönchsschild in dir zieht das Böse an.

translation.en: Evil will find you now. If you don't kill it, it'll kill you.
translation.de: Das Böse wird dich finden und töten, wenn du es nicht tötest.

translation.en: And not just you...
but all who stand close to you.
Mr. Young. How many more?
Two... outside.
[in Cantonese] Asshole!
Who are you?
I'm a chef.
[Uncle Six] There's an old proverb. "It is better to be a dog in peaceful times,
translation.de: Ein Sprichwort sagt: "Es ist besser, ein Hund in Friedenszeiten zu sein

translation.en: than a man in times of unrest."
translation.de: als ein Mann in Zeiten der Unruhe."

translation.en: The good people of Chinatown have come to embrace this axiom...
translation.de: Die Einwohner von Chinatown halten sich an diese Maxime,

translation.en: as the Triad has come to rely on the feud and vendetta code of old China
translation.de: während die Triaden sie mit dem Fehde- und Rachekodex des Alten China durchsetzen.

translation.en: to enforce it.
The streets of Chinatown are ruled by face,
translation.de: In den Straßen von Chinatown entscheiden das Gesicht,

translation.en: fate and favor.
They flow from my hand, to the tongues and fists of my soldiers.
translation.de: Sie gehen von meiner Hand auf die Zungen und Fäuste meiner Soldaten über.

translation.en: Chinatown understands us.
I thought you did, too.
But then, you took matters into your own hands.
translation.de: Aber ihr handeltet auf eigene Faust.

translation.en: We didn't know he was protected.
translation.de: Wir wussten nicht von seinem Schutz.

translation.en: We thought he was a chef. A cook. Nobody special.
translation.de: Wir hielten ihn für einen Koch, für niemand Besonderen.

translation.en: Everyone is someone special until I tell you they're not.
translation.de: Jeder ist besonders, bis ich sage, er ist es nicht.

translation.en: The chef...
He did this to you?
And what did you do to him? Nothing. We waited, but he never came home.
translation.de: -Und was habt ihr getan? -Nichts. Er kam nicht nach Hause.

translation.en: So, who worked you over?
Some old guy. Bald.
A monk.
Never seen him before. But he was strong.
translation.de: Hab ihn noch nie gesehen. Aber er war stark.

translation.en: We should be on the lookout for him.
[in Cantonese] Pity he's not here to protect you now.
translation.de: Leider kann er euch jetzt nicht schützen.

translation.en: Shit!
What is that?
[man] Just give me a second, all right?
How did you do that?
I have never seen anyone...
do what I saw you do.
Hey... who are you?
I'm the Wu Assassin.
♪ I will ♪
